title: Secret Love: My Friendâ€™s Mom 2
overview: Due to a strained relationship with his girlfriend, the male protagonist found it difficult to achieve sexual satisfaction and had to spend all day with his friend. It wasn't until he met his friend's mother that he realized that there were still such beautiful and mature women in the world. Although the male protagonist harbored evil thoughts, due to his identity and relationship, he could only bury his emotions deep in his heart. However, his friend's mother seemed to be very fond of the male protagonist and began to constantly dress herself up, And trying various temptations to lure the male lead into the bait
